text: 1:20: Eph 2:16 Hanchu, Nâipasal jârin Pathien'n rammuol pumpui ama tieng nanâk hong tuong nôk rangin a masat zoi. Pathien'n a Nâipasal khros chunga a thisen1:20: a Nâipasal thisenin; aninônchu a Nâipasal thina inbôlna. jârin inngêina a sina, masikin pilchung le invâna om neinunngei murdi ama nanâkin anruonin a kôm ahong tuong mikhîr nôk ngei zoi ani.
